physical_appearance:\The image shows a drawing. The lines drawn are all black in colour. The figure of a man has been drawn. He is depicted as having a moustache
 and sitting down with one feet over the other knee.He is also drawn to be wearing slippers and his stomach is drawn to be portly. The signature and year
 \\Tan. 1963\\ is stated at the bottom right hand side. There are two vertical lines of Chinese characters
